title: 10/11/17 -  Hollywood Stars are Beginning to Fall (Kelly Shackelford &  Erick Erickson join Glenn)
description:
Why is California changing this law?...Purposely spreading HIV no longer a felony ...knowingly infecting partners ...Report: President Trump calls for a tenfold increase on US nukes...here comes another global arms race? ...The NBC report that is putting all of us in grave danger ...Jeffrey Katzenberg vs. Harvey Weinstein ...Gay coffee shop owner refuses to serve Christians...ACLU silent...Legal expert Kelly Shackelford from www.firstliberty.org joins the show to discuss this case...government is forcing us to say things we don't believe ...'Why didn’t NBC run this story? … Finally breaking their silence...Harvey Weinstein helped bankroll Hillary and Obama...Not just about the left eating their own...this is something we should all come together on ...The Berlin Wall reset? ...Real Change vs. Fake Change …Did the Obamas know? ...Flashback to 2013: Hollywood's open secret revealed at the Oscars? ...Actor Ben Affleck is suddenly 'sad and angered' by Weinstein ...CNN calls out the Obamas ...The media under the microscope…the powerful will destroy you ...New terrifying audio from the Las Vegas shooting has just been released...‘the calm before the storm’ ...more saber-rattling from North Korea...here come the bombers...how close to another World War are we? ...Author Erick Erickson joins the show to discuss his new book, ‘Before You Wake: Life Lessons from a Father to His Children’...The biblical beginnings of Twitter?

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck and Stu Burguiere, Weekdays 9am–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
